template.docs:
The `template` datetime platform allows you to create a datetime with templated values using [lambdas](https://esphome.io/automations/templates.html#config-lambda).

*See also: [Template Datetime](https://esphome.io/components/datetime/template.html#template-datetime)*

id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The ID of the datetime to set.

*See also: [Datetime Component](https://esphome.io/components/datetime/index.html#datetime-datetime-set-action)*

datetime.docs:
**string, datetime parts, [templatable](https://esphome.io/automations/templates.html#config-templatable)**: The value to set the datetime to.

*See also: [Datetime Component](https://esphome.io/components/datetime/index.html#datetime-datetime-set-action)*

set.docs:
This is an [Action](https://esphome.io/automations/actions.html#config-action) for setting a datetime datetime state. The `datetime` provided can be in one of 3 formats:

*See also: [`datetime.datetime.set` Action](https://esphome.io/components/datetime/index.html#datetime-datetime-set-action)*
